item.title: strip for December / 28 / 2012
Evil Inc on Comixology!
item.dc:creator: Guigar
item.description: I'm really excited to announce that there will soon be another way to get Evil Inc comics on your digital device. Comixology has started carrying the Evil Inc monthly comic as part of its creator-owned division. You can find October's issue -- the Real Housewives of Transylvania -- there now, with more to be updated in the coming months. Remember, this is a new initiative by Comixology, so there are bound to be a few hiccups along the way, but I expect to have the monthly downloads available there at the same time you can find them here, on the...
item.content:encoded:
I'm really excited to announce that there will soon be another way to get Evil Inc comics on your digital device. Comixology has started carrying the Evil Inc monthly comic as part of its creator-owned division.

You can find October's issue -- the Real Housewives of Transylvania -- there now, with more to be updated in the coming months.

Remember, this is a new initiative by Comixology, so there are bound to be a few hiccups along the way, but I expect to have the monthly downloads available there at the same time you can find them here, on the Kindle Store, or at DriveThruComics. Once those wheels are in motion, I will upload the back issues -- and maybe even a few more goodies.

Meanwhile, kudos to Comixology for their push in supporting creator-owned work!

item.title: Courting Disaster: Dec. 28, 2012
item.dc:creator: Guigar
item.description: Courting Disaster is my weekly relationship-advice comic where a reader asks a question, and you give the advice. A reader writes... Q.: Don't get me wrong, I love my girlfriend, and her being over a head and a half taller than me doesn't embarrass me in any way like I know it would other guys. Hell, I always say she's perfect height for hugging because my face plants right into her chest! However, there is a small mechanical problem. Sex can be really uncomfortable for us because of my height, I really want to be able to kiss her during,...
item.content:encoded:
Courting Disaster is my weekly relationship-advice comic where a reader asks a question, and you give the advice.



A reader writes...

Q.: Don't get me wrong, I love my girlfriend, and her being over a head and a half taller than me doesn't embarrass me in any way like I know it would other guys. Hell, I always say she's perfect height for hugging because my face plants right into her chest!

However, there is a small mechanical problem. Sex can be really uncomfortable for us because of my height, I really want to be able to kiss her during, but I ... can't even reach.

The things I can do to her are kinda limited by my height and i'm worried i'm not pleasing her like I could.

Any tips on how to make up for my "size?"

Don't answer here... go to the Courting Disaster site to offer your advice.

item.title: strip for December / 27 / 2012
Original Art - $40 for select originals!
item.dc:creator: Guigar
item.description: From now until January 1, 2013, I'm offering any of the available originals that ran after Sept. 3, 2012, for $40 apiece. That half-off the already-reduced convention price! Unfortunately, none of the Saturday strips are available. Just use the ADD TO CART button below. Simply enter the date of the original you would like and process your payment. In the event that the original you've chosen isn't available, I'll get in touch and you can either (a) pick another or (b) have your entire payment refunded. Signed originals are produced on heavy bristol board with archival ink. They measure about...
item.content:encoded:
From now until January 1, 2013, I'm offering any of the available originals that ran after Sept. 3, 2012, for $40 apiece. That half-off the already-reduced convention price!

Unfortunately, none of the Saturday strips are available.

Just use the ADD TO CART button below. Simply enter the date of the original you would like and process your payment. In the event that the original you've chosen isn't available, I'll get in touch and you can either (a) pick another or (b) have your entire payment refunded.

Signed originals are produced on heavy bristol board with archival ink. They measure about 13 inches wide by 4 inches tall.

While you're at it, you might want to check out the deep discounts on Evil Inc graphic novels that also expire on New Year's Day.

$40 Evil Inc Originals
Enter date of original


Evil Inc Graphic Novels starting at $5


Starting now until January 1, 2013, these Evil Inc graphic novels will be priced starting at $5 apiece! That's at least half-off the cover price for each.



 If gran'ma gave you a few bucks for the holidays that are burning a hole in your pocket, now you have an excellent place to spend it! Click here to find out more!

Courting Disaster: Dec. 14, 2012
item.dc:creator: Guigar
item.description:
Courting Disaster is my weekly relationship-advice comic where a reader asks a question, and you give the advice.
A reader writes...
Q. I have been dating another girl for months now and we're a very hapy couple, but recently I have felt the craving for a "male influence." How do I bring this up with my partner?
Don't answer here... go to the Courting Disaster site to offer your advice.

item.title: Evil Inc Monthly: December
item.dc:creator: Guigar
item.description: Download all of December's Evil Inc comics today! If you don't want to wait for the comic to update once-a-day, you can download all of December's comics, formatted to make it easy-to-read on iPads, Kindle Fires and other digital tablets. And if you're a Kindle Fire user, please consider buying the "MOBI" file through the Evil Inc store and using the Send to Kindle app to place it on your device. Here are a few details: • In this issue, the Mind Games storyline from last month concludes. Dr. Haynus and Dr. Muskiday have attached a mind-control device to Captain...
item.content:encoded:
Download all of December's Evil Inc comics today!

If you don't want to wait for the comic to update once-a-day, you can download all of December's comics, formatted to make it easy-to-read on iPads, Kindle Fires and other digital tablets. And if you're a Kindle Fire user, please consider buying the "MOBI" file through the Evil Inc store and using the Send to Kindle app to place it on your device.

Here are a few details:

• In this issue, the Mind Games storyline from last month concludes. Dr. Haynus and Dr. Muskiday have attached a mind-control device to Captain Heroic. But Cap doesn't know that -- and neither does the smitten Amazing Amazon.

• PLUS: A Tale from the Evil Inc Archive special: A story from the past of Cap's father, Commander Heroic. What will he do when an old flame threatens the life his son has made with the villainous Miss Match.

If you would like to be notified when next month's download is available, let me know, and I'll add your email address to my list. I won't use the list for anything other than download notifications, and you can be removed at any time.



*Saturday strips are not included. They're not part of the story, and I usually prepare those on the fly (sorry, Muskiday), a couple day before they appear on the site. The October download collects Monday-through-Friday strips from Oct 1- 26.

 Just don't spoil it for the others!





Evil Inc Monthly: Mind Games Pt. 2 (Dec 2012) (Evil Inc Monthly Comic)

...Or buy it here and use the Send to Kindle app to place it on your tablet...

Download the PDF for your iPad or other tablet.



BACK ISSUES


-- APRIL
-- MAY
-- JUNE
-- JULY
-- AUG
-- SEPT
-- OCT
-- NOV
-- DEC

You can also buy the Evil Inc monthly comic on...
